SEARCH
Package com.diploma.inno.component

Class CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor.Builder

java.lang.Object
com.diploma.inno.component.CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor.Builder
Enclosing class:
CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor
public static class CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor.Builder extends Object
Builder class for fluent configuration of CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor instances.

This builder provides a convenient, type-safe way to configure complex advisor settings with method chaining, validation, and sensible defaults. It's particularly useful when integrating with Spring's configuration system or when creating multiple advisor instances with different settings.

Configuration Options:

  • defaultConversationId: Fallback conversation identifier
  • chatHistoryWindowSize: Maximum historical messages to retrieve
  • order: Execution priority within advisor chains

Usage Examples:


 // Basic configuration
 CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor advisor = CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor
     .builder(chatMemory)
     .build();

 // Advanced configuration for Jenkins monitoring
 CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor advisor = CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor
     .builder(chatMemory)
     .defaultConversationId("jenkins-security-pipeline")
     .chatHistoryWindowSize(150)
     .order(-1000)  // High priority execution
     .build();

      Sets the default conversation identifier for requests without explicit IDs.
      Parameters:
      id - the default conversation ID, typically a Jenkins job name
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining

    • chatHistoryWindowSize

      public CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor.Builder chatHistoryWindowSize(int size)
      Sets the maximum number of historical messages to retrieve for context.
      Parameters:
      size - the window size for conversation history. Must be positive.
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if size is not positive

    • order

      public CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor.Builder order(int order)
      Sets the execution order within the advisor chain.
      Parameters:
      order - the execution priority. Lower values execute first.
      Returns:
      this builder instance for method chaining

    • build

      public CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor build()
      Builds a new CustomMetadataChatMemoryAdvisor with the configured settings.
      Returns:
      a fully configured advisor instance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any configuration is invalid
